snippet: The right-wing and anti-migrant Law and Justice party has won a majority of seats in Poland’s Parliament and can govern alone.
abstract: Poland's right-wing Law and Justice party wins majority and can govern alone.
lead_paragraph: The right-wing and anti-migrant Law and Justice party has won a majority of seats in Poland’s Parliament and can govern alone.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Poland: Party’s Total Is Enough to Avoid a Coalition
headline.main: Poland: Party’s Total Is Enough to Avoid a Coalition
